column5: What would you do if you had the choice today? Deadbaiting for big fall pike, or trib walking for a big rainbow? I cant decide. Lol
That is a hard choice.....if push comes to shove i would go for Pike
If try fly fishing for a big pike! Or centerpin with a big minnow on a huge floatThere is plenty of months ahead to get a big rainbow.
I had a dream of steelheading last night, take it as a sign if you want.
Go pike! I would be out there now if my motor was running
Well I chose wisely apparently.. hit a local trib and landed my PB steelhead on a musky buck! Gotta love fall.. next time some pike will get a piercing
